definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
unit of area equal to 100 畝|亩[mu3] or 6.67 hectares/a short while/a little while ago/circa. (for approximate dates)

sentences.english: The area of the property increased from 11 hectares to 29 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 目前该产区的面积从11公顷增加至29公顷的范围。

sentences.english: The area of the property increased from 11 hectares to 29 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 目前该产区的面积从11公顷增加至29公顷的范围。

sentences.english: But fifty-two thousand hectares of farmland were flooded as a result.
sentences.chinese: 但是五万二千公顷农田被淹，结果。

sentences.english: For example, American white moths are damaging 1.5 million hectares of forests every year.
sentences.chinese: 例如，每年有150万公顷的森林遭受美国白蛾之害。

sentences.english: About 20 farmers and 45 hectares around Danyang were affected.
sentences.chinese: 丹阳有约20家农户和45公顷瓜田受到影响。

sentences.english: Forests blanket 133.7 million ha of China.
sentences.chinese: 中国现有森林面积13370万公顷。

sentences.english: In Brazil, 220 million hectares of land are occupied by pastureland.
sentences.chinese: 在巴西，220万公顷的土地被占用的牧场。

sentences.english: The farm itself consists of forty acres grazed by sheep.
sentences.chinese: 这个农场本身由四十公顷，供羊啃食的草地组成。

sentences.english: In total, the Riviera Coomera facility covers 14 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 里维埃拉高玛拉总部占地面积达到14公顷。

sentences.english: And nearly 20-million hectares of crops are drying up.
sentences.chinese: 而且接近2千万公顷庄稼干枯了。

sentences.english: We also have the second largest planting area of 108 hectares in Medoc.
sentences.chinese: 我们拥有美度区第二大面积的108公顷的葡萄园。

sentences.english: The Churchill bushfire burnt out more than 30, 000 hectares of land.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉尔山火烧毁了超过3万公顷的土地。

sentences.english: The grain output per hectare can be increased by more than 1,500kg.
sentences.chinese: 每公顷粮食产量可以提高1，500公斤以上。

sentences.english: It covers an area of 290 hectares，and has halls，pavilions，corridors and bridges almost everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 它占地290公顷，亭台楼阁和回廊小桥比比皆是。

sentences.english: For the south park planning area, warehousing and logistics area 24 hectares.
sentences.chinese: 工业园最南部为仓储物流区，规划面积24公顷。

sentences.english: Its area is equal to 14 hectares.

definition: classifier for fields/unit of area equal to one fifteenth of a hectare
floor area/occupied area/footprint (of a building, piece of equipment etc)
area (of a floor, piece of land etc)/surface area/tract of land
Dongzhi county in Chizhou 池州[Chi2 zhou1], Anhui
